name: My Room Number Time Bed Set

reviews.name: My Room Number Time Mini Bed in a Bag Bedding Set, Grey
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed with how great this bedding set looks and feels. Looks great in my sons room definitely a good product for the money!!!
reviews.title: Love this!!

reviews.name: My Room Number Time Mini Bed in a Bag Bedding Set, Grey
reviews.reviewText: Great look for the price! Red isn't as bright as pic but still worked with my decor. It's more of a muted / washed out brick red. Light weight comforter and sheets but very soft.
reviews.title: Great look!

reviews.name: My Room Number Time Mini Bed in a Bag Bedding Set, Grey
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bedding set for my sons room. The comforter has a nice full appearance but is not too heavy and the sheets have a softer feel than I expected at this price.
reviews.title: Love this bedding set
